About EC2 Session Gate

Cross-platform application to manage EC2 instances and establish secure connections via AWS Systems Manager (SSM).

Key Features
SSH Connections

Secure shell access via SSM port forwarding

RDP Support

Remote desktop connections for Windows instances

Custom Port Forwarding

Forward any port through SSM tunnels

Secure by Default

Instance Management

Configurable

Customizable port ranges and preferences

About

EC2 Session Gate is a cross-platform Flask application that simplifies managing EC2 instances and establishing secure connections through AWS Systems Manager Session Manager. This fork is maintained and continuously improved based on real-world usage and feedback.

Maintainer: Walid Boussafa (walid.boussafa@outlook.com)
Contributions, feedback, and improvement ideas are always welcome!

GitHub Repository Contact Email
Built with using Flask, Bootstrap, and AWS SDK

SSH Key Folders
Folder paths where SSH keys are stored. You can add multiple directories. Keys will be automatically searched across all folders and used to decrypt Windows passwords if found.
